face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] nose and mouth twitch and transform as they push out into a slerms's muzzle, and [npc.her] tongue forks, thins and grows longer, turning into a erratic tongue. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.faceSkin+] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.sheIs] left panting and sighing as [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to catch [npc.her] breath.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an [style.boldAlligator(slerm face)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription]. Within [npc.her] [npc.mouth], [npc.she] has a [style.boldAlligator(slerm tongue)].
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)], slerm face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a dripping muzzle.
